of free space to operate. Consider moving the program to SD card if possible.
To display your location, this app needs permission to access your device\'s location. Please grant the permission in the next dialog.

To display your location, this app needs permission to access your device\'s location. Because you have denied this permission permanently before, you can only enable it in the system settings of this app. Do you want to open the settings dialog now?
No location source available. Would you like to open the system settings for location sources?
Show the scale of the map
Adjust the move speed of the map
Adjust the size of fonts on the map
Display tips and tricks when starting the app
Show system info about the app and manage permissions
Show system settings for location sources
Show personalized ad banners. If you deactivate this option, only non-personalized ads will be displayed
Display the boundaries of the map tiles used to create the map
Display the current zoom level in the upper left corner
Display the current coordinates of the map center in the upper left corner
No results. Try a less specific query…
If you do not find what you\'re looking for, try setting the match mode to \"anywhere\" and remove category restrictions by selecting \"all categories\".
With this menu you can configure the icons and labels that appear on the map.
Use the switch at the top to toggle the visibility of all icons and labels at once.
To enable or disable specific elements on the map touch the desired item\'s checkbox in the list.
The available categories are organized in groups that can be toggled altogether. You can expand these groups and select contained items independently.
You can use the buttons just below the textfield to refine the search results.

Use the first button to select the match mode, i.e. where you would like the search query to appear in the name: for example, if you select \"starts with\", each item\'s name in the results will begin with your input. Similarly, there is an option \"ends with\", but there are also two more modes: \"anywhere\" and \"exact\". \"Anywhere\" means that the query can appear anywhere in the name, while \"exact\" means that each name has to match your query exactly. By default, the mode \"anywhere\" is selected.

With the second button you can adjust the order of results. You can choose \"alphabetic\", reverse alphabetic (\"inverse\") and \"by distance\". The \"by distance\" mode will sort results by distance from the center of the map (i.e. the portion of the map that is currently visible in the map view). It will also display the distance from the center of the map for each item.

With the third button you can select the categories of items to include in the search. For example you could configure to look only for streets or just for restaurants. However, you can select any combination of categories: another example would be to restrict the results to museums and theatres or hotels.

You can select which icons and labels are visible on the map, so that you can find what you\'re looking for more easily and to make the map better readable. Touch the button in the top left corner or swipe from the left to open the sidebar where you can configure the visible items.
To find streets, restaurants, shops or other points of interest, open the search dialog by selecting the magnifying glass in the menu bar at the top.
To show your current location on the map, select the GPS icon in the menu bar. It may take a while before your location appears on the screen.

While showing your location on the map, you can toggle the button that appears at the top left corner to lock the map\'s position to your location. This makes it easy to track your location, so that you always know where you are.
If you would like to increase the font size of the text displayed on the map, there is an option for that in the preferences menu.
The preferences menu also allows you to configure other things such as the visibility of the scale bar, or whether the app runs in fullscreen mode.
For this city there is also a public transport map available that let\'s you browse the transportation network:
We offer maps for several other cities and regions. You can either browse the maps on our website or download our manager app that let\'s you browse all maps conveniently:

We created a world map app that let\'s you browse a political map of the world and explore countries and cities. It also includes some useful information about countries and a little quiz about country flags and more:
Do you sometimes want to play a board or dice game and don\'t have any dice? Maybe you would like to use our decent dice simulator:

This program has been implemented with great care to help you exploring this city. The data it presents has been taken from the OpenStreetMap project. Because of OpenStreetMap\'s collaborative way of collecting data, we cannot make warranties of any kind about the accurateness, correctness, completeness or reliability of the information presented here. This applies especially to all location based information presented on the map as well as information such as telephone numbers or website URLs. Because we cannot guarantee the validity of the data presented, this software is provided on an \"As Is\" basis without a warranty of any kind. Thus you should not rely on the information presented here, but instead always consider additional sources of information as well. Especially in road transportation, local traffic signs and traffic lights do of course apply and take precedence over any information on this map.
License: Open Data Commons Open Database License (ODbL)

The legal basis for this privacy policy is the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). The controller for the processing of any kind of personal data through this app is Sebastian Kürten (sebastian@topobyte.de).

As the publisher of this app, we take the protection of your privacy very seriously. Hence we do not process or store any personal data about you. It is also impossible to us, because no data is transmitted from this app to either us, our servers or third parties.

If you activate the location display, the app reads your device\'s location so that it is able to display it on the map. Depending on your system settings, it will detect your location via GPS, Wifi or GSM with varying accuracy. If you use this functionality, you consent to the processing of this information for the purpose of displaying it on the map. Your location is not transmitted to us or third parties and hence is not processed or stored by us. Your location data is not permanently stored and you can stop processing it at any time by disabling the location display.
